name: PensionsEurope
goal:
PensionsEurope represents the national associations of pension funds and similar institutions for pension provision (Full Members). PensionsEurope has also members which are service providers that work with pensions, such as asset managers, law firms, etc... (Corporate and Supporter Members)

PensionsEurope aims for people in Europe to have good pensions. We promote different forms of workplace and other funded pensions as an efficient and affordable form of pension provision.
The association has 23 national member associations having more than 4 trillion euro of assets under management as funding to the supplementary retirement income of over 110 million European citizens.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives:
- IORP Directive
- Capital Markets Union
- Financial markets regulation
- long-term investments
- economic governance
- EU pension policy
- taxation and accounting
